basics.name: Daneel van Tonder
basics.label: Software Developer / Programmer
basics.summary: I have completed my studies at CTI education Group and also earned my Bachelor of Science degree through Heriot-Watt University. I love playing with new tech and reading up on the latest trends in the market. Although I've been developing desktop applications from the start of my career until now, I have always had an interest in web development. I'm currently studying on Udemy and also experimenting with technologies like Javascript, Node.js, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, Bootstrap, Typescript, React.js. I also build wordpress websites for small companies after hours, just to get some exposure to real life web projects.

work.summary: It Specialists for large retail clothing groups like Ackermans and PEP. Part of the Point of Sale team, we are responsibale for the development of our inhouse Point of sale software which runs at +- 3000 branches and on +- 20 000 tills. This is also not just a Point of sale software, but a complete store management software. From employee leave, ordering stock to cash and card transactions
highlights: Development and upgrades on Point Of Sale software
Scheduling and monitoring of version Rollouts
Develop supporting apps for helpdesk team
Database table design for new Point Of sale features
Development of windows services for error checking and other automated tasks

work.summary: Manufacturing and Supplier of word class lubricants for the automotive trade. I was responsibale for all of the warehouse duties. From equipment and transport maintenance to making sure plant runs on schedule and orders gets delivered on time
highlights: Route planning for deliveries, managing drivers
Ordering of raw materials and packaging
Maintanance and repairs of equipment and vehicles

work.summary: Manufacturing and Supplier of word class lubricants for the automotive trade. I was responsibale for taking orders via the telephone and email
Small Hydraulic Supplies company in Paarden Eiland. I was basically an all arounder here, from sweeping the warhouse floors to selling hydraulic fittings and hoses to customers
